name: Tangram Block Puzzle
description:
Tangram Block Puzzle a simple and addictive game with tons of levels and totally free for all!

Drag and drop the pieces with different shapes onto the board and fill the board without letting any empty space.
If you are a fan of classic puzzles and  brain teasing logic puzzle games, try tangarm board puzzle and see if you can solve all puzzles.

How to Play:
- Drag the geometric pieces into the board to fill it.
- Use hints to help you.
- No time limit.

Features
- Easy and simple gameplay.
- drag and drop gameplay.
- Tons of brain teasing tangram levels
- Beginner, master levels and impossible pack
